metadata.description: Additional information attached to the subscription item.

canceled_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the subscription was canceled.

current_period_end.description: Timestamp indicating when the current billing period ends.

plan.description: Details of the plan associated with the subscription item.

tiers.description: Tiers of pricing for the plan of the subscription item.

items.description: Individual pricing tiers with specific criteria for the plan.

flat_amount.description: Flat fee amount for this tier.

unit_amount.description: Unit amount for usage within this tier.

up_to.description: Upper usage boundary for this tier.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'plan'.

aggregate_usage.description: Type of usage aggregation for the subscription.

created.description: Timestamp indicating when the plan was created.

statement_description.description: Description to be shown on the customer's statement for the plan.

product.description: ID of the product associated with the plan.

statement_descriptor.description: Descriptor shown on the customer's credit card statement for the plan.

interval_count.description: Number of intervals between each billing cycle.

transform_usage.description: Transform usage to a new quantity in the subscription.

amount.description: Amount in the smallest currency unit representing the plan price.

interval.description: Interval at which the plan is billed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the plan associated with the subscription item.

trial_period_days.description: Number of days in the trial period for the plan.

active.description: Flag indicating if the plan associated with the subscription item is active.

tiers_mode.description: Mode to define tiered pricing, either 'graduated' or 'volume'.

billing_scheme.description: Scheme for how prices will be billed for the plan.

livemode.description: Flag indicating if the plan is in live mode.

currency.description: The currency of the plan price.

metadata.description: Additional information specific to the plan of the subscription item.

updated.description: Timestamp indicating when the plan was last updated.

subscription.description: ID of the subscription to which the subscription item belongs.

trial_start.description: Timestamp indicating when the trial period for the subscription item starts.

created.description: Timestamp indicating when the subscription item was created.

cancel_at_period_end.description: Flag indicating if the subscription will be canceled at the end of the current period.

quantity.description: Quantity of the plan to be included in the subscription item.

tax_percent.description: Tax percentage applied to the subscription item price.

current_period_start.description: Timestamp indicating when the current billing period began.

start.description: Timestamp indicating when the subscription item starts.

discount.description: Any discounts applied to the subscription item.

application_fee_percent.description: A fee percentage applied to the subscription that will be transferred to the platform owner.

id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription item.

status.description: Status of the subscription item, e.g., 'active', 'trialing', 'canceled'.

customer.description: ID of the customer to whom the subscription item belongs.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'subscription_item'.

livemode.description: Flag indicating if the subscription item is in live mode.

ended_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the subscription ended.

trial_end.description: Timestamp indicating when the trial period for the subscription item ends.

billing_thresholds.description: Threshold rules that trigger billing actions for the subscription item.

usage_gte.description: The usage threshold that triggers the billing for metered billing subscriptions.

tax_rates.description: Tax rates applied to the subscription item price.
